item.title: oc Tips
item.description: OC Command Tips $ oc login -u system:admin $ oc whoami --config=$HOME/.kube/config Show all resources…​ and I mean ALL: $ kubectl api-resources --verbs=list --namespaced -o name | xargs -n 1 kubectl get --show-kind --ignore-not-found -n openshift-monitoring Show docker images on node for each node found in pods listing. (Thanks Todd Penn) $ for node in $(oc get pods -o jsonpath='{range .items[*].spec}{.nodeName}{" "}{end}'); do echo $node; ssh $node "docker images";done Capture total CPU usage in cluster:
